name: Billy335 the Bot
description:
Entry for LDJAM46

Your creation, Billy#335 is undergoing a set of tests. 
However he is not the brightest robot, 
so you have to keep him "alive"
and make him go as far as he (you) could by helping him.

Billy#335 is running through platforms. 
Change the direction of the platform by clicking on it 
to prevent Billy#335 from falling to his inevitable death.

BGM from Open Game Art:
Barry "Ishara" Peddycord http://isharacomix.com
Akikazer
